# Instant Messaging Keys

**API Collection**

The keys used to specify the different fields in a [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABInstantMessageProperty] property.

## Overview

Neither developers nor users can add more keys.

## Constants

- **kABInstantMessageUsernameKey**: The instant messaging username or handle.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceKey**: The instant messaging service.

## Social Media Constants

- **Instant Messaging Services**: The predefined constants are used to identify instant messaging services.
- **Social Profile Services**: The predefined constants are used to identify social networking services.
